description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by July 5 14:00hrs EST. All bids submitted after July 5 14:00hrs EST EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
_Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) Contracting Entity_

## U-100 Water Pressure Reduction Project
### Solicitation Information

* **Reference Number**: WS3723369223-Document 4040573565
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3723369223
* **Publication Date**: 2023-06-05
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-07-05T14:00:00 (EST)

### Background
This procurement is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the U-100 Water Pressure Reduction Project, with a focus on plumbing construction services. The project is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Scope
The procurement scope includes the following:

* Plumbing adapters (UNSPSC Code: 40141719)
* Plumbing connectors (UNSPSC Code: 40141720)
* Plumbing spiders (UNSPSC Code: 40141732)
* Specialized public building construction services (UNSPSC Code: 72121400)
* Plumbing construction services (UNSPSC Code: 72151100)

### Procurement Details
* The procurement method is Competitive - Open Bidding.
* The selection criteria is Lowest Price.
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Technical Specifications
No specific technical specifications have been outlined.

### Address for Service
Submission of bids should be directed to:

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec
K1A 0S5 Canada

### Contact Information
For further information, please contact:
Gregoire Morin (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: gregoire.morin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Autodesk Document Inquiry
Please refer to the link for the Ariba Discovery website for document inquiries:
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16487129?extsite=MTY0ODcxMjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Closing
Please disregard the initial posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 14:00hrs EST on July 5.

All bids submitted after 14:00hrs EST on July 5 will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. CSA 2023amendment copyright
